security.title: Securities
security.description: A security is a financial instrument that confirms the owner's right to certain property, such as money in a specified currency or a share in a company. Previously, securities were printed and presented physically, but now they mainly circulate in electronic format.

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.description: The total volume of Kazakhstan's bond market in national currency reached more than 50 trillion tenge (100 billion USD) by the end of 2024. It is necessary to note the balanced structure between the government securities market (XX%) and corporate bonds (YY%). Historically, the bond market, both government and corporate, has developed as exchange-centric, with the accumulative pension system playing a significant role in its development through the Unified Accumulative Pension Fund, which became the main large institutional investor in the bond market.
